comments.body: It seems like all three of those should be documented in the same place.  But perhaps that's the subject of a different PR.
That seems like a good enhancement. Future work.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +42,46 @@    The ssh port number, for :ref:`ssh <ssh_connection>` and :ref:`paramiko_ssh <paramiko_ssh_connection>` it defaults to 22.
:ref:`ansible_user<faq_setting_users_and_ports>`
    The default user name to use for log in. Most plugins default to the 'current user running Ansible'.

Each plugin might also have a specific version of a variable that overrides the general version. For example, ``ansible_ssh_host`` for the :ref:`ssh <ssh_connection>` plugin.

comments.body: ansible_ssh_host feels like it should link into a specific location in the ssh_connection docs.  But that probably would require more template work to add new refs there.  So probably also subject of a new PR.
